bibl.title: Early Roman Cage Cups.
bibl.note: Includes a reassessment (by D.W., pp. 29-33) of the "Lighthouse Beaker" from Begram (Afghanistan) showing probably the ship-filled harbor and the light-house at Alexandria (late 1rst-early 2nd century A.D.).
bibl.seg: Koster Annelies and David Whitehouse, Early Roman Cage Cups.

Includes a reassessment (by D.W., pp. 29-33) of the "Lighthouse Beaker" from Begram (Afghanistan) showing probably the ship-filled harbor and the light-house at Alexandria (late 1rst-early 2nd century A.D.).
